name: Caesar ROT7 Challenge 3
content:
# Caesar Cipher Challenge - ROT7
# Encrypted with rotation 7

encrypted = "mshn{jhlzhy_johsslunl_3}"

print("Encrypted message:", encrypted)
print("Hint: This is a Caesar cipher")
print("Try different rotations to decrypt!")

name: RSA Challenge 15 (Small Exponent)
content:
# RSA Challenge - Generated
# n = 12011399 (p = 3343, q = 3593)
# e = 5
# Encrypted message: 552420

n = 12011399
e = 5
c = 1105534

print(f"n = {n}")
print(f"e = {e}")
print(f"c = {c}")
print("Factor n to decrypt the message!")

name: URL Encoding Challenge 3
content:
# URL Encoding Challenge

encoded_message = "flag%7Bencoding_challenge_3%7D"

print("Encoded message:", encoded_message)
print("Hint: This is URL encoded")
print("Decode it to get the flag!")

name: XOR Single-Byte Challenge 9
content:
# XOR Single Byte Challenge
# Encrypted with key 0x14 (20 decimal)

encrypted_hex = "727875736F6C7B664B777C757878717A73714B2D69"

print("Encrypted flag (hex):", encrypted_hex)
print("Hint: Single byte XOR key was used")
print("Try all 256 possible keys!")
